ygData.subject: Re: Something fun to try
ygData.msgSnippet: On the other side of the coin, I hate people who when attacked by a nasty mob proceed to lead the train into unsuspecting players in hope of transferring the
ygData.messageBody:
On the other side of the coin, I hate people who when attacked by a nasty
mob proceed to lead the train into unsuspecting players in hope of
transferring the train to them. That happened to me last night while
hunting Crocs in Oasis. I was healing the backside of the pillar. When
someone who was being chased proceeded to train the SG across the water
and onto the pillar. Sheer stupdity and callousness or just panic? I
would think it would be the former.

Treilanin - Bard of Kelethin - Karana
